Package com.vaadin.data.util

Provides implementations of Property, Item and Container interfaces, and utilities for the data layer.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHierarchicalBeanContainer<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
    An extension of BeanContainer that is Container.Hierarchical.
    HierarchicalBeanContainer<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
    An extension of BeanContainer that is Container.Hierarchical.
    HierarchicalBeanItemContainer<BEANTYPE>
    An extension of BeanItemContainer that is Container.Hierarchical.
    ShortcutPropertyDescriptor<BT>
    Property descriptor that is able to create shortcut property instances for a bean (nested or not).

Package com.vaadin.data.util Description

Provides implementations of Property, Item and Container interfaces, and utilities for the data layer.

Various Property, Item and Container implementations are provided in this package. Each implementation can have its own sets of constraints on the data it encapsulates and on how the implementation can be used. See the class javadocs for more information.
